channel.title: planahead on Awesome resources for Hardware Description
channel.description: Recent content in planahead on Awesome resources for Hardware Description

item.title: HDLmake
item.description: “A tool designed to help FPGA designers to manage and share their HDL code by automatically finding file dependencies, writing synthesis & simulation Makefiles, and fetching IP-Core libraries from remote repositories Synthesis Makefile generation Simulation Makefile generation HDL parser and dependency solver GIT/SVN Support Multiple HDL Languages Multiple Tools Multiple Operating Systems”
